Mr. FINSTAD. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize the 2025 Class 1A  Minnesota State Girls Hockey Champions: the Dodge County Wildcats.

On February 22nd, the team won their first-ever state title at the  Xcel Energy Center in a suspenseful overtime game against Warroad. The  Wildcats claimed the win with a 4-3 final score.
